amendment.description: Amendment in the nature of a substitute sought to prohibit human somatic cell nuclear transfer technology to initiate a pregnancy and allow its use for medical research.
amendment.purpose: Amendment in the nature of a substitute numbered 3 and printed in House Report 108-21.

action.text: Amendment (A002) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Greenwood.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Greenwood amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 174 - 231, 1 Present (Roll no. 37).
